Class Tweets

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tweets

  • public class Tweets
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    creynaud Tool to get tweets from twitter account. Add some tools to work on it. Procedure to start the application - go to TwittTraining directory - start Mongo DB : ./startMongoDB.sh - ask for Tweets application help : ./startTweets.sh To retreive tweets: - ./startTweets.sh retreive To read all tweets: - ./startTweets.sh read To search tweets: - ./startTweets.sh search To start application in socket mode - ./startTweets.sh socket
